structure.unit: LEVY AND ASSESSMENT OF PROPERTY TAXES

law.catch_line: State local finance officer to provide tax rate calculation assistance.
law.text: In the event that a special taxing district desires assistance in the area of property tax rate calculation, the state local finance officer may provide such assistance.
law.history: Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 319, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1980.
